reviews.review:
Nice atmosphere with a challanging and diversified gameplay. Had a lot of fun playing it.
The ending hits you like a fucking train and you just sit infront of your computer like... dayum... that was awesome.

-Booker, are you afraid of god?
-No, but I'm afraid of you.

Começamos assim com Bioshock Infinite, o terceiro (e espero fortemente que não seja o último) de uma franquia que simplesmente AMO... E tentarei explicar o que Bioshock tem de especial, e o que o INFINITE tem de único:

A estória simplesmente é excepcinal, são poucos jogos de FPS que propõe idéas e enredos tão profundos e cheios de reflexão na atualidade (apesar de que estamos falando de uma série da geração 'passada').
A jogabilidade é impecável (no caso do Infinte, muito melhor do que os 2 primeiros).
E não tenho em exageros em dizer que mesmo sendo um jogo 'full single-player', é um dos poucos que valem cada centavo pago pela qualidade do produto final.

QUANTO AO INFINITE:
Ele tem uma proposta diferente e semelhante aos 2 primeiros, trazer novamente uma idéia 'utópica'... mas diferente da pegada com um toque de horror que acontece em Rapture.
Simplesmente o jogo está mais lindo que nunca, Columbia não poderia ser mais deslumbrante.
A forma de jogar utilizando o 'sky hook' trouxe novidades na forma de jogar, trazendo dinamismo na jogabilidade.
Apesar que o Father Comstock não ser um "Andrew Ryan", A Elizabeth compensa qualquer outro personagem latente.

Queria muito falar mais sobre, mas definitivamente qualquer coisa a mais seria spoiler... Mas dou uma dica:
Compre o jogo base, e recomendo fortemente o Bureal At The Sea para compreender bem mais do jogo.
Amazing Story line, And great DLC
Amazing.
Gran juego 100% recomendable
Estilo Steampunk, lembra bem o Dishonored, jogo muito bom, vale a pena comprar.

at the end of the game my brain broke.
when i gained consciousness i understood 
all that was possible and will be
Best game ever!

Güncelleme: Oyunu bugünlerde benim emektarda tekrar oynama fırsatım oldu; bu nedenle incelememi düzenledim. :)

[h1] Kader... [/h1]

İnsanların, belki de çoğunun, hala anlamakta zorluk çektiği bir konu . 
İşte Bioshock İnfinite oyun boyunca yaptığımız ''kader''i bize oyun sonunda sorgulatıyor.

Booker DeWitt adında bir detektifi kontrol ediyoruz. Amacımız, yıllar önce [i] borç olarak verdiği [/i] kızını geri almak ve onunla dönmek. Tabi kendisini bulutlar üstünde bir şehirde bulacağını bilmeden...

Şehre vardıktan sonrasında, yol boyunca bizlere Elizabeth adında güzeller güzeli bir kız eşlik ediyor. (Buradan sanat yönetmeni kimse ellerine sağlık diyorum hakketen çok güzel kız :D ) Sahip olduğu bir yetenek ile beraber, cephane, tuz ve sağlık ihtiyaçlarınızı savaş esnasında karşılıyor.

Oyun mekanizmaları çok hoşuma gitti, gerçek gibiydi diyebilirim. Maalesef ki arada bizim 2k nın meşhur bug'larıyla burada da karşılaştım, ama elbette ilk iki oyunundan önemli derecede ders almış olacaklar ki, bende o kadar sorun yaratmadı.

BioShock ve BioShock 2'de hafiften de olsa tırsarak oyunda ilerlerken, mekanın da biraz karanlığa kaçmasından ötürü ruhumuzu karartırken, İnfinite'de tam tersi açık havada, güzel ortamlarda oynamanın keyfini yaşıyorsunuz.

Ne yazık ki düşük kalitede oynadığımdan (bilgisayarımdan ötürü), oyunun güzelliğini yaşamanın fırsatını bulamadım. İlerde ola ki bir kez daha oynarsam, sağlam bir bilgisayarda ekran görüntüsünü en yüksek seviyeye çıkarıp oynayacağım.
 
Ama şuraya yazmazsam içim rahat etmeyecek: 
[b] Bu oyunda emeği geçen senaristlerin taa.... :P [/b] (müthiş bi sondu...)

[i] Yaptığımız tercihler kaderimizi etkiler [/i] mesajı böylesine güzel verilemezdi...

[b] 8/10 [/b]
This is probably one of the best games I've played. Loved the way it looked, the gameplay was incredebly fun and the story was amazing. Definitly a game Im gonna replay a few times since I love it.

Oynu en zor modta bitirdim,bir iki yerde mallık yapmasam 1 kez bile ölmücektim ana senaryo o kadar basit olmuş.Bioshock 1 ve 2 yi defalarca bitirmiş biri olarak diyebilirim ki önceki oyunların zorluğundan gram eser yok.Etrafta loot yaparak zaten ammo ve medkit bulabileceğiniz gibi,bir de yetmezmiş gibi her zora düştüğümüz anlarda Elizabeth bir yerlerinden ammo bittiğinde ammo,ölmek üzereyseniz medkit çıkarıp veriyor.Düşman yeri geldiğinde iyi siper alıyor ama genelde size hedef olabilmek için etrafta fink atıyorlar.Oynun en  baba düşmanlar Handymanler bile üzerinize dash attıktan sonra kısa devre yapıp saniyelerce yerde çakılı kalıyorlar,böyle anlarda bazukayla 3-5 kez vurduğunuzda kolayca ölüyorlar.Nerde o bir düzine Big Dadyi öldürünce gelen Big Sisterları öldürmek için sürüyle trap kurup,etraftaki machineleri hackleyip yinede öldüğümüz eski oyunlar.Hacki ve lockpickingi kaldırmalarıda cabası.Senaryo güzel sayılır.Her zaman ki gibi mindfucklar içeriyor :)Columbia bana Rapture ın verdiği karanlık atmosferin yerini tutamadı.Burial at sea ye gelirsek konuyu ilk oyuna bağlıyor.Rapture a geri dönmenin verdiği hazzı anlatamam.Zorluk önceki oyunlar kadar olmasada Infinite a göre hayli zor.Öyleki başarım açabilmek için hard a alıp oynadım.Sadede gelecek olursak biraz Burial at sea yle konuyu toparlamaya çalışsalarda Infinite,bir Bioshock fanı olarak beni pek tatmin etmedi.Ancak FPS severlere tavsiye ederim.Alcak olanlar meta puanına aldırmasınlar.Olmadık oyunlara astronomik puanlar verir oldular son yıllarda bence bu oyun içinde geçerli.
游戏是好游戏，还有官方中文，就是玩着有点晕啊，而且感觉会时不时闪退（win10）
Masterpiece
Great graphics even in low settings and nice story!

画面惊艳，即使以2016的眼光来看；剧情深邃，游戏本体剧情自成一体，DLC又贯通3部曲，最终带来无限的思考，当然，要靠自己一个在游戏录音带中理清剧情很难很难，只能说我智商不够，脑洞也跟不上编剧。
生化奇兵完结了，一个壮丽的诗篇，可惜在游戏过程我只能对全局剧情管中窥豹，遗憾。
Игра просто супер все на высоте 100/10
Ya conocia el final, y jugarlo me dejo con el nudo en la garganta!!!

Я рекомендую эту игру всем, даже если вы не играли в первые два биошока. Это совсем разные миры, если в первых двух это мрачные коридоры умершего Восторга, и изредка во второй части мы прогуливаемся за пределами города непосредственно по дну океана, то в этой игре мы наблюдаем довольно-таки красивый город в облаках под названием Колумбия. Это очень красивые, свободные улицы, это переливы солнца практически во всем(до поры, до времени конечно же :D, Я считаю, что это очень хорошая идея после двух первых, абсолютно мрачных по атмосферности частей, так сказать привив биошоку эту самую мрачность, взять и сделать настолько солнечной и светлой третью игру. Честно говоря, я сразу догадался про Комстока, Элизабет и Букера, про то кем они друг - другу являются, но такого размаха в сюжете, я не ожидал. А еще, еще мне понравилось то, что, я был не один, практически всю игру, вам помогает Элизабет, тогда как в первых двух вы выживаете в одиночку, не в том смысле, что вам никто по мере игры из персонажей не помогает, а в том смысле, что тактильно вы постоянно один(не считая конца второй части).
Вобщем мне игра понравилась, для меня на 10 альф из 10 дельт и одного проблемного крещения.
Ps: Есть ещё и дополнения где Элизабет и Букерр(Комсток) в Восторге, где они имеют прямое отношение к событиям первой части, но это уже совсем другая история)
Ps:Ps: и да, сценаристы  явно употребляли наркотики :D
Dije que Bioshock es una obras maestra, y con Infinite no falla para nada, tocando varios temas en el camino de su historia sin desviarse del todo

Es como la chica de tus sueños.. cuando lo terminas sabes que no hay nadie como ella... y te queda un vacio.. asi se siente terminar Bioshock INFINITE

BioShock Infinite, czyli dzieło sztuki w gatunku gier komputerowych. Jest absolutnie cudowna. Bioshock to duchowe dziecko System Shocka, ale dopiero Infinite wykorzystuje dziedzictwo czyniąc z tego nową jakość. 
Infinite tworzy własny mit. There's always a lighthouse. There's always a man. There's always a city. 
W tym przypadku mężczyzną jest prywatny detektyw Booker DeWitt, a miastem latający cud techniki/fizyki - Columbia, rządzone przez religijnych fanatyków pod wodzą proroka Comstocka. Booker dostaje pozornie proste zadanie - odnaleźć i uwolnić porwaną dziewczynę, szybko jednak sprawa okazuje się być bardziej skomplikowana, gdyż poszukiwane dziewczę - Elizabeth - jest uznana za cudowne dziecko proroka, które przyniesie zbawienie mieszkańcom Columbi. Czy wspominałem już, że prorok najwyraźniej "przewidział" próbę porwania i jest na przybycie DeWitta aka fałszywego pasterza odpowiednio przygotowany? 
Skoro już wspomniałem Elizabeth, to nie mogę dłużej ukrywać, że jest ona najcudowniejszą NPC jaką widziałem. Jest piękna, napisana z głębią, animowana z charakterem, po prostu żywa. Do tego twórcy postarali się aby nie pozostawała bezużyteczna, czy to podczas walk, czy zwykłej eksploracji. 
Walki... nawet na zwykłym poziomie trudności potrafią być wymagające, do tego są piekielnie dynamiczne. Poruszamy się po całym terenie walki (genialne szyny), często zmieniamy bronie (można mieć tylko 2 sztuki z niewielkim zapasem amunicji, rzecz bardzo upierdliwa, ale najwyraźniej skuteczna), szukamy osłon i korzystamy ze wsparcia naszej podopiecznej. 
Do tego piękna grafika, bogata w detale (Unreal Engine 3, jest co podziwiać), liczne znajdźki, wolty z fizyką i jedna z najlepszych fabuł w strzelankach. 
Aczkolwiek DLC do niej to takie trochę przegięcie, coś w rodzaju sztuki współczesnej.
One of the best story driven games ever made.

Tudo colabora para um resultado primoroso aqui. 

Ambiente é lindo, as cores são escolhidas a dedo para cada situação, Columbia em si é um grande espetáculo visual. Trilha sonora de extremo bom gosto. Ótima jogabilidade, permite uma variedade de estratégias durante o decorrer do jogo.

A história é desconexa no começo, mas aos poucos tudo se clareia até o impactante final. Os personagens são muito bem construídos e não dá para não se envolver com os dois protagonistas ao longo da história.

Uma obra-prima. 10/10

Проходил игру на ПК и остался очень доволен. Irrational Games делают очень хороший ход в котором они переносят игрока из воды в облачный город Колумбия. История довольно хороша, и озвучка, из которой герои на высшем уровне.
Геймплей игры с небольшими изменениями, появился уникальный крюк в небе с помощью которого вы можете летать по всей Колумбии. Еще в игре нам дают попробовать себя в роли волшебника, который имеет магические способности. Плюс есть такое оружие как пистолеты, автоматы и дробовики которые очень понравились мне. Красивая девушка с прелестным характером, Элизабет, очень удачно вписалась в игровой процесс. По мере прохождения игры Элизабет помогает Букеру снабжая его боеприпасы в бою или монетами. Сценарий может конкурировать с современными фильмами. А финал игры меня просто удивил, долго после прохождения вдумывался в детали.
Hace tiempo había jugado Bioshock 1 y me encantó, pensé que ningún otro juego de Bioshock me iba a gustar tanto hasta que jugué Bioshock Infinite 20.1/10

Das Spiel hat mich einfach mit offenem Mund vor dem Rechner sitzen lassen :D musste erstmal drauf klar kommen was Irrational Games da für ein unglaubliches Meisterwerk geschaffen hat.

Bioshock Infinite bekommt von mir volle 10 von 10 Punkten, das Gameplay ist zwar nur mittelmäßig doch die Story, der Soundtrack und die ganze Atmosphäre ist so KRASS GENIAL dass dies nicht wirklich auffällt oder wichtig ist.

Die Story wird mich auf jedenfall noch eine ganze Weile beschäfigen und braucht sich vor keiner Film- geschweige denn Spielstory der Welt verstecken, Wirklich GANZ GROßES KINO !!

Bioshock Infinite struggles to be even a mediocre experience in today's market. 

I originally rated this game well, and it was a successful enough title when it released I guess, but in my opinion it doesn't stand the test of time. Unless you're really dying to play this particular title there are many shooters available for a comparable price that can do what this game does better. 

The only thing going for this game is the graphics. When i went to replay this game on the hardest difficulty, it became apparent what an unpolished mess the combat was.

Bioshock Infinite has one of the worst stories I've had to sit through. Period. It has nothing to do with the events of Bioshock 1&2 and considering there wasn;t a single theme or event you couldn't have explored as a prologue in Rapture, I can't figure out for the life of me why. Rapture was a brilliant idea, and it wouldn't have been mine to abandon it.

 This new and unrelated plot is insulting, contradictory and drags on for far longer than it deserves to in order to  inflate the game's run time. Narrative themes are beaten to DEATH through dialogue and cutscenes ad naseaum. There's way too many arbitrary rabbitholes that when considered in the context of the main point of the story, make you shake your head and wonder why. 

 Without giving too much away, your character is given the task of finding an airship. You need this airship to fly to Paris. During your quest to obtain this airship, you commandeer a fucking airship. Perfectly capable of flying to Paris. Which you blow up, because.... reasons.


Then you start traveling through portals in time and space to cover up the massive plot holes, dead ends and fuck you's written into the plot. You even end up traveling to a universe to find a weapons cache, that ended up not being in your universe cuz reasons, to trade in your universe a woman who bargained those weapons for an airship she stole from you. at gunpoint. But you can't travel back to that original universe, your character tries to fulfill that deal with the same woman of the second universe.

No I'm totally with you. It's absurd to think that someone is going to honor a deal they never made with you, for guns they don't need. However, that's exactly what the developers expect you to believe.

It gets better. Not only does she not give you the ship, she tries to kill you because you are clearly not the character from HER universe. Seriously. This story was written in crayon. The plot is full of crap contingencies like this that do nothing but drag out the length of the game.

In fact at one point, as a deus ex machina, the young girl who rips the portals through time and space actually materializes an airship OUT OF THIN AIR to save you. 

No, it gets even BETTER. At one point You and Elizabeth come across a locked gate, and your solution, is to have Elizabeth magically put ANOTHER lock on the gate. As if picking that one had ANYTHING to do with the lock that was ALREADY ON. This game is bafflingly stupid and I honestly can't figure out if the developers were trying to be insulting, or if they themselves ate paint chips as a kid. The world may never know.

You're given trivial illusions of choice throughout the game that lead to what has to be one of the worst endings in video games ever. I personally thought this ending was worse than Mass Effect 3. Yoiu're murdered by your own daughter via drowning after 20 minutes of cutscenes.

That's another thing you can look forward too. ridiculous amounts of unskippable dialogue and scenes that will have you groaning and banging your head against the keyboard.

 As far as 1999 mode is concerned, it seems as though the development team just cranked up enemy damage and absorbtion and patted themselves on the back. Bioshock Infinite is TERRIBLY thought out and designed at that difficulty, with heavy enemies literally spawning on top of a player's head and behind them with the ability to instant kill the player. Then the player will spawn directly in front of that same enemy, who now has had his health bar refreshed. Even running behind cover, the game can bug and you can get smashed/shot THROUGH cover, often times well away from the attack.

Speaking of health bars, that same heavy got stuck in the map. Even after emptying both of my upgraded guns into his critical zone while standing still, i still had to go get more guns and ammo. That's ridiculous, not a fair challenge.

I say " terribly thought out", but I have no doubt the development team behind this game knew they were being lazy and superficially adding depth to their game by simply altering damage. It's a cheap cop out and probably shouldn't have been implemented in the unpolished state the game is in. Some places are so poorly designed I wonder if anyone on the development team bothered testing 1999 mode, otherwise they should have observed they didn't have the chops to pull it off. 

It's an objectively poor experience when you waste 20 minutes on a boss fight and you're KO'd through cover. It's an objectively poor experience to waste almost a half an hour going all out on the final fight, only to realize that it's bugged and will send heavy indefinitely forcing you to restart the game.

Ultimately I think this game does has some moments, but It's attention to immersive detail, quality graphics,  gore effects and minor iterations to combat from previous installments are not enough to redeem the outstanding faults Infinite has. I would have a hard time recommending this to the top of your gaming queue over even it's predecessors, let alone other FPS titles on the market.

Just Wow ive been a big bioshock fan since bioshock 1-2 but when i saw infinite i thought it was going to be bad since it was a whole new city but not even close after it being out for 3 years im ashamed i waited so long to play it gameplay is amazing graphics look like 2016 graphics still really sad that i waited 3 long years to finaly play my favorite series last game

Игра супер, проходил не моргая. В общем супер!
BioShock Infinite лучшая часть из всех трех. Новая атмосфера летающего города заставляет думать о легкости, но события закаляют характер героя.
Amazing and so lovely, i finished it couple days ago and i wish i could play it forever like it's the first time.

Second best to the original bioshock, bioshock inifinite tries to push the envelope with better graphics, gameplay and story, but ends up falling pretty short. I had no issues running this on my MBp intel hd 4000, but I dont think the 13 hrs it took me to complete the game substiantiates the thirty dollar price tag. This one felt rushed. The story was engaging for the first half, but completely throws you for a loop with interdimensional travel and it just feels lazy and tacked on. Least to say, by the finale, I was not emotionally invested and could care less about the two main protagonists, which is a surprise considering I cared more for the silent protagonist of the first game. Weapons are meaty, but there is no rhyme or reason to use one over another, i used the carbine and machine gun the whole game. Same goes for the plasmids, or should I say, vigours, I only ever used bucking bronco along with the fire one. And it was short. 3 hrs of exposition followed by short bursts of gameplay, very dissappointing especially with all the good praise this game gets. I wish people were more realistic in thier reviews bc I probably would have gotten this on sale instead of jumping on the overwhelmingly positive bandwagon.
Emotional, Beautiful, Amazing Story
Гавно !

Um jogo em que mudou o meu conceito sobre os games... A partir daí parei de jogar apenas jogos online e comecei a jogar campanhas!
BioShock Infinite foi um ótimo jogo... A história é meio confusa, mas vai se encaixando. Eu não tenho muito a dizer sobre os personagens, pois eles vão evoluindo muito rápido com a história...

Gráficos: 10/10 > Efeitos visuais sensacionais e cenários bem vivos.
Trilha sonora: 10/10 > Ouvir Jazz em toda parte do cenário, isso é uma coisa que me agradou e muito no jogo!
História: 10/10 > Pode ser dificil de entender, mas se você prestar atenção no jogo você com certeza vai entender tudo!
Jogabilidade: 9/10 > Só não dou 10 porque é meio confuso na hora de escolher entre poderes e armas.

Man, where do I begin.  Im going to try to keep this spoiler free.  The game may be the best story first person game that I've ever played.  The whole game you have the best companion possible, Elizabeth.  You really connect and always want to save and protect her no matter what.  The game played with my emotions, and it hurt my brain in the end, but Im not going to talk about that.  This game did everything right, the story, gameplay, charchters, and the best and most confusing ending of all time.  People may disagree with me, but this is the best campain I have ever played.  I want to play it again, but it wont be the same.  If only I had Elizabeth with me.....

I played this game a long time ago on PS3 but bought this on sale recently for the PC... Although I still think Bioshock 1 was the best of the series, this game holds its own with a new setting (city in the sky)  and it works perfectly with the skyline system.

The only thing in this game that I did not like was the optional quests (I think there is only 2) but they felt tacked on.. Having to go back quite a distance just to open a chest with a key to get "meh" loot was very underwhelming.

Also, the vigors (plasmids) were awesome but you could exploit some of them in such a way to make the game ridculously easy and this is with the first vigor you get in the game.

Game can become a bit repetative over time but the story is pretty good that you will want to push on and see the ending. This game has a pretty awesome twist too.

The voice acting is top notch, and the graphics still hold up well to this day.

Play the game, you wont be disappointed.

O que dizer de Bioshock Infinite assim como toda a Saga Bioshock ? Sinto que qualquer que seja o comentário feito à respeito seria insuficiente para representar a grandeza de toda a obra. É (junto a Assassin's Creed) a série de games que mais admiro e reverencio. E quando escrevo "obra", não estou exagerando de forma alguma; Seria inescusável considerar Bioshock "apenas mais um jogo". Avalio-o como uma obra de arte, pois seu conteúdo não se rebaixa em nada para obras do cinema, música, livros, artes plásticas ou seja lá qual versão você imagine. Biochock faz parte de um minguado movimento de resistência que persiste na busca em proporcionar ao seu público "consumidor" algo que vá além do entretenimento barato. Em outras palavras, na era da geração "CoD/CS/BF", onde os dedos e rankings têm mais relevância que a simples atividade cerebral do raciocínio, Bioshock busca atingir a porção "pensante" do seu ser. Para tanto, a obra usufrui de valores esquecidos pela sociedade moderna e propóe debates inestimáveis sobre religião, cultura, política, filisofia, história e ainda mais. Faça um exercício rápido e se pergunte quantas composições conseguem isso atualmente. É bem raro !
Como se necessitasse dizer mais algo além do já dito, Bioshock ainda possui um enredo brilhante (onde poucos se comparam) que vai te deixar pensando durante um mês e vai te tocar para o resto da sua vida (é sério! Fiquei sem dormir direito por uma semana, no mínimo), para isto, basta que você tenha um pouquinho de atividade cerebral. Tal narrativa é solidificada por personagens que de tão únicos, são apaixonantes. Elizabeth é (em minha visão) a personagem feminina mais incrível de toda a história dos video games e você vai se apegando a ela de tal forma que sentimos o seu crescimento ao longo da história. Para citar características do gameplay em si, lembro que B.Infinite ainda tem momentos de bastante diversão para os amantes de jogos de tiro. Tudo isso em meio à um Columbia fantástica e ricamente criada, possuidora de visões chocantes que vão te deixar perplexo. Contudo, como dito no começo do texto, nada do que eu diga poderá atingir o poder que a própria experiencia irá lhe proporcionar.
Enfim, para não me alongar mais do que já o fiz, digo que Bioshock é uma arte única e intelectual em meio à uma abundância de criações sem sentido e meramente recreativas em seus vazios intelectivos. Se você valoriza o seu cérebro: Entre e viva em toda a Saga Bioshock! Abraços.
